_comment: This data is an early work-in-progress and contains errors. Keys with _else are produced with non-trained Stanford NLP and as such only includes capitalized words. The + designates a segment range. Produced by @michaelh at Discuss and Discover SuttaCentral forum - please get in touch! Finished code forthcoming.
pli-tv-bi-vb-np6:2.1.13^where_before_or_: Sāvatthī in the Jeta Grove, Anāthapiṇḍika's Monastery
pli-tv-bi-vb-np6:2.1.13^who_mentioned_be: the nun who has been given the full ordination in unanimity by both Sanghas through a legal procedure consisting of one motion
pli-tv-bi-vb-np6^where: Sāvatthī in the Jeta Grove, Anāthapiṇḍika's Monastery
